creator: alexeys@inventigo.com
text:
Currently it is impossible to run the same script within ANT with different
parameters.

It would be nice if the <script> task where to accept <param> and <refid>
attributes whose name define a variable available directly in the script.

Today you can get do the same thing using something like:

   <antcall target="scriptdef">
     <param name="var1" value="...."/>
   </antcall>

   <target name="scriptdef">
     <script>
        println(var1);
     </script>
   </target>

Yes properties with names that match java identifiers are readily available
to the script as variables. Same for references.

The only problem is that given inmutability it is dificult to reuse a script
library.
